name: BadCraft 3D
description:
Made in Pico-8, this creative block-builder game will surely give you minutes of enjoyment.

Features:

*Randomly generated worlds to explore
*Unintuitively designed controls
*40 blocks to build with
*No saving
*Never updates
*Not actually 3D

Controls:

*Arrow Keys: Move (Select hotbar while holding X)
*Z: Place blocks, enter
*X: Back (Hold to select hotbar)

I made this over a year ago but forgot to release it. Whoops.
